title: SettlementReport
description: This schema provides the fields for a merchant to return a settlement report based on order sales and customer returns on Jet.com

settlement_report_id.description: The unique ID for this settlement report.  This ID should be referenced when creating a dispute with Jet.com

settlement_state.description:
The status of the current settlement

            #Valid Values

            * submitted - the payment has been submitted to your bank and is awaiting deposited
            * deposited - the payment has been deposited to your bank
            * rejected - the payment was rejected by your bank.  Please check your deposit information.

currency.description: The currency that all monetary values are represented in for the settlement report retrieved

unavailable_balance.description: The total value of all sales and returns that are not settled yet.  This value will remain unavailable until settlement occurs.  This value is provide for estimation purposes and is not considered final.

settlement_period_start.description:
The start date/time of the settlement report

			#Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

settlement_period_end.description:
The end date/time of the settlement report

			#Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

order_balance.description: The total value of orders that is settled in this settlement report

return_balance.description: The total value of orders that is settled in this settlement report

jet_adjustment.description: A credit given to a merchant or fee taken from the merchant

settlement_value.description: The total value of orders that is settled in this settlement report

merchant_price.description: The merchant price of the product

jet_variable_commission.description: The variable commission charged by Jet or paid to the merchant

fixed_commission.description: The fixed commision for a sale

tax.description: The tax charged to the customer for buying the item

shipping_revenue.description: The shipping revenue charged to the customer for buying the item

shipping_tax.description: The tax charged on shipped revenue

shipping_charge.description: If the item is sold via DBJ (Distributed By Jet), then this is the charge for shipping the item to the customer

fulfillment_fee.description: If the item is sold via DBJ (Distributed By Jet), then this is the charge for Jet to fulfill the customer order

product_cost.description: If the item is sold via DBJ (Distributed By Jet), then this is the all in cost of the product sold to the customer

merchant_price.description: The merchant price of the product being refunded to the customer

jet_variable_commission.description: The variable commission that was paid to the merchant or charged by jet

fixed_commission.description: The refunded fixed commision for a sale

tax.description: The to be returned tax charged to the customer for buying the item

shipping_tax.description: The tax charged on shipped revenue to be returned to the customer

merchant_return_charge.description: Any charges for the return that the merchant is required to pay

return_shipping_charge.description: Any charges for return shipping that the merchant is required to pay

return_processing_fee.description: If the item is being returned to Jet fulfillment center, then this is processing fee charged by Jet

product_cost.description: If the item is sold via DBJ (Distributed By Jet), then this is cost of the product that will be returned to the merchant
